shaderTexts.title: Noizu
shaderTexts.description: Custom build a Audio player for Linux and Mac. Building a light and simple player for linux, based on my old love to sonique and winamp. I do miss those programs when UI and UX were actually interesting and different.

shaderTexts.title: YaEsta Pacman
shaderTexts.description: Watch as the cubes rotate and move when new shaders appear. Each interaction creates unique patterns.

shaderTexts.title: Moving Photon
shaderTexts.description: I collaborated on developing the Virtual Experience for an interactive installation/performance created by installation artist Participation in Moving Photon can be in 5 different ways, including a Phantom performance,interactive installation, interactive performance,interactive performance with EEG and remote performance.

shaderTexts.title: Glitch Machine
shaderTexts.description: A custom Glitch App build for, it lets you play with a image applying different filters and export the resulting image for printing
